John Driscoll, Mr. and Mrs. Alfred Harrison, Mr. and Mrs. John Andrus, Mr. and Mrs. Judson Dayton, Mr. and Mrs. Stephen Keating, Mr. and Mrs. Pierce McNally, Mr. and Mrs. Donald Dayton, Mr. and Mrs. Wayne MacFarlane, and many other generous friends of the Institute
description: after Polykleitos, Roman copy of Greek original, the original executed in bronze, c.440 BCE; one of four known extant copies
object_name: Roman copy of a Greek bronze statue of c. 450-440 BCE
title: The Doryphoros (after Polykleitos)
